
minimal ancestor deviation (MAD) method of rooting phylogenies 



```{bash}

# First get the program downloaded

git clone --recursive https://github.com/davidjamesbryant/MADroot.git

# Citation: Tria, F. D. K., Landan, G., and Dagan, T. (2017). Phylogenetic rooting using minimal ancestor deviation. Nature Ecology and Evolution, 1, 0193.

# Then go into the directory and run things there
cd MADroot

# Now run this for the Pseudomonadales outgroup

./madRoot /path/to/files/concat_511_pseudomonadales_outgroup/pseudomonadales_511_concatenated-best_alphaproteobacteria165-clean.fa.treefile > /path/to/files/concat_511_pseudomonadales_outgroup/MADroot/mad-rooted_pseudomonadales_511_concatenated-best_alphaproteobacteria165-clean.fa.treefile

# Also run for the broad outgroup (same command listed below when trying with imported tree)

./madRoot /path/to/files/broad_511_concatenated-best_alphaproteobacteria165-clean/broad_unrooted.newick > /path/to/files/broad_511_concatenated-best_alphaproteobacteria165-clean/MADroot/mad-rooted_broad_unrooted.newick

# Also run for the original outgroup

./madRoot /path/to/files/concat_511_initial_outgroup/initial_511_concatenated-best_alphaproteobacteria165-clean.fa.treefile > /path/to/files/concat_511_initial_outgroup/MADroot/mad-rooted_original_unrooted.newick

# What happens when we run this baby with no outgroup (but SAR11 V and IV are included)

./madRoot /path/to/files/no_outgroup_511_concatenated-best_alphaproteobacteria165-clean.fa/no_outgroup_511_concatenated-best_alphaproteobacteria165-clean.fa.treefile > /path/to/files/no_outgroup_511_concatenated-best_alphaproteobacteria165-clean.fa/MADroot/mad-rooted_no_outgroup_unrooted.newick

# Also run for the broad outgroup 

./madRoot /path/to/files/broad_511_concatenated-best_alphaproteobacteria165-clean/broad_unrooted.newick > /path/to/files/broad_511_concatenated-best_alphaproteobacteria165-clean/MADroot/mad-rooted_broad_unrooted.newick

```
